title: Bizarre! Mother props up son’s dead body to throw farewell party at bar
text:
Bizarre! Mother props up son’s dead body to throw farewell party at bar By India.com Staff on October 21, 2015 at 5:01 PM Comments 
23-year-old Jomar Aguayo Collazo is seen sitting in a bar in Rio Piedras, Puerto Rico. He is seen sitting casually at his mother’s bar playing a game of dominoes. But it will astound you that the Collazo is actually dead, and it’s just his body propped up at the family bar! The whole set up is nothing but a mother’s peculiar send off party for his son who was shot dead. 
The youngster was shot dead along with two other at the bar in his birthday party due to some drug incident. After the attack Jomar was found dead, while four others were injured. Jomar Aguayo Collazo was found dead with a gun by the police. 
Post all this, the mother of the 23-year-old decided for this one of a kind send off. She propped her son’s body onto the table, placing him as if he is playing the game of dominoes. He is seen wearing blue track suit, black glasses and a cap. He is casually sitting holding dominoes in one hand and a condom in another. (ALSO READ: WTF! Man feeding dead daughter for six months charred to death) 
His mother is seen giving a peck on his cheeks at the bar, the very same bar where he was hot on his 22nd birthday. Not only his mother but also Jomar’s relatives joined the bizarre family ritual of Jomar’s farewell. They bid him goodbye at the same bar with music, drinks and dance! What do you thing about this bizarre farewell party? (Photo credits: Daily Mail)
